alert.note: Alert for Graham; Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 06 at 3:07AM CDT until October 06 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Dangerous Fire Weather conditions expected over Graham and Norton counties this afternoon and early evening... .A strong northerly gradient is expected to impact the region today ahead of an approaching high pressure system. Locales across Graham and Norton counties will see these winds later today, along with a period of very dry conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 004 AND 016... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 8 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 004 Norton and 016 Graham. * WINDS...North 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
